**Convertible Bond — Conversion Price**

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
set.seed(805)
face_value <- 1000
conversion_ratio <- round(rnorm(1, mean = 40, sd = 3), 2)
conversion_price <- face_value / conversion_ratio
conv_price_round <- round(conversion_price, 2)
conv_price_ans   <- round(conversion_price, 0)

```


You own a bond with a face value of $`r face_value` and a conversion ratio of   `r conversion_ratio`. What is the conversion price?
